properties.entry: INSERT INTO GUESTCOMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, CONTENT, SPACE_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_GCNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )

SELECT G.COMMENT_NO As "Comment_No", USER_ID, G.CONTENT AS "게스트답글", INSERT_DATE, NVL(H.CONTENT,' ') AS "호스트답글" FROM GUESTCOMMENT G JOIN MEMBER M ON(G.USER_NO=M.USER_NO) JOIN SPACE S ON(G.SPACE_NO=S.SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN HOSTCOMMENT H ON(H.COMMENT_NO=G.COMMENT_NO) WHERE S.SPACE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO HOSTCOMMENT (HOSTCOMMENT_NO, CONTENT, COMMENT_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_HCNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? )
UPDATE HOSTCOMMENT SET CONTENT = ? WHERE COMMENT_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "count" FROM HOSTCOMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = ?
SELECT CONENT FROM HOSTCOMMENT H JOIN GUESTCOMMENT G USING(COMMENT_NO) WHERE H.COMMENT_NO = ?
